examples: we thought Sue was older than Bill but just the reverse was true
public opinion to the contrary he is not guilty

definitions.text: a logical relation such that two propositions are contraries if both cannot be true but both can be false
very opposed in nature or character or purpose
examples: acts contrary to our code of ethics
the facts point to a contrary conclusion

definitions.text: of words or propositions so related that both cannot be true but both may be false

examples: an obstinate child with a violent temper
